lyric: 作词 : Ruby Qu
作曲 : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 Arranger : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 Producer : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
We rise together as our destiny unfolds
translation: 随着命运的展开，就让我们一同迎战

lyric: We face the darkness and our trials are yet untold
translation: 而考验尚未结束，我们仍需直面黑暗

lyric: Through the shadows of despair
translation: 穿过绝望的阴影

lyric: Oh, in silence, hopes we share
translation: 在沉默中，我们共享希望

lyric: To chase our dreams that we’ve declared
translation: 只为追逐我们宣告中的理想

lyric: We glimpse, through our eyes
translation: 我们曾尝试多看一眼

lyric: Yet fools, blind our sights
translation: 却被无知蒙蔽了视线

lyric: Can’t make what they say
translation: 既然听不懂他们的注解

lyric: We’ll find our way, we’ll find our way
translation: 那就由我们找寻自己该走的路

lyric: Heads up! The wheels are spinning
translation: 请注意！命运的车轮正在转动

lyric: Across the plains, in valleys deep
translation: 跨越平原，穿过深谷

lyric: To dawn, the wheels that sing
translation: 向着黎明，这车轮行滚滚而行歌唱着

lyric: An unending dream!
translation: 一个无尽的梦！

lyric: Heads up! the tracks are running
translation: 请注意！轨道已然在运转

lyric: Across the plains, where shadows hide
translation: 穿过阴霾藏匿的平原

lyric: We run, we stride~
translation: 我们奔跑，我们向前

lyric: In the face of fear and plight, and yet we hold our ground
translation: 面对恐惧和困境，我们依然坚守阵地

lyric: In life we stand, and strive, our victory is found
translation: 历久弥坚，胜利定会在望

lyric: And the storms we’ve weathered through
translation: 我们已穿越风雨

lyric: And we hope in the light of truth
translation: 只希望能沐浴在真理的光芒中

lyric: To break free from chains, and come anew
translation: 挣脱枷锁，重获新生

lyric: Heads up! The wheels are spinning
translation: 请注意！命运的车轮正在转动

lyric: Across the plains, in valleys deep
translation: 跨越平原，穿过深谷

lyric: To dawn, the wheels that sing
translation: 向着黎明，这车轮行滚滚而行歌唱着

lyric: An unending dream!
translation: 一个无尽的梦！

lyric: Heads up! the tracks are running
translation: 请注意！轨道已然在运转中

lyric: Across the plains, where shadows hide
translation: 穿过了阴霾藏匿的平原

lyric: We run; we stride~
translation: 我们奔跑，我们向前

lyric: Heads up! A steady rhythm
translation: 抬起头！跟着坚定的节奏

lyric: A destination that’s ever near
translation: 终点已近在咫尺

lyric: It comes! Stride to our kingdom
translation: 迈向我们的理想之地

lyric: And see the light of day
translation: 让一切重见曙光

lyric: Heads up! the wheels are singing
translation: 请注意！命运的车轮正在歌唱

lyric: The whispers and secrets they’d keep
translation: 他们保守着苦痛的秘密和私语

lyric: To hope! We bound~
translation: 而我们终将迎来希望

lyric: Break free, we chased our dreams, beneath the starry night
translation: 挣脱束缚，我们在星空下追逐梦想

lyric: In the face of god, we rose, as one
translation: 面对神灵，我们团结一致，奋勇向前

lyric: 人声 Vocal Artist：Chevy
木吉他 Acoustic Guitar：陈义
电吉他 Electric Guitar：陈义
架子鼓 Drums：眭逸凡Patrick
和声 Backing Vocal：Chevy/宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)/温菁 Jing.W (HOYO-MiX)/林一凡Fan (HOYO-MiX)/王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)

人声录音师 Vocal Recording Engineer：Nik Hotchkiss
乐器录音棚 Instrumental Recording Studio：升赫录音棚Soundhub Studio

混音师 Mixing Engineer：阿烈@Soundhub Studios
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
